ygData.subject: RE: Lute of the Gypsy Princess *SPOILER*
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh, I just read that today too. Playing an SK a lot now so I m drooling over this. The problem is getting the loot (not to mention getting to MM as a Human
ygData.messageBody:
Heh, I just read that today too. Playing an SK a lot now so I'm drooling
over this. The problem is getting the loot (not to mention getting to MM as
a Human SK)... doubt I'll be able to afford the price people will be asking
for it.

However, I have a suspicion this is the lute that also enhances Bard
skills. It could have a dual-purpose, some other items do.

Any bards on Zek wanna sell me that lute? :- )

Dud

-----Original Message-----
From: John Kim [SMTP:kim@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 15, 1999 8:19 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Lute of the Gypsy Princess *SPOILER*

From: John Kim <kim@...>

Found this on a spoiler site. The lute is part of a quest,
and thus unlikely to ever enhance our songs:
